mention.text: Anderson , wearing a dark sweater and white shirt
Perez de Cuellar , who oversaw the negotiations for the release of Western hostages
the Bekaa Valley , '' the secretary-general said.
due to snow , the usual road they use to go from somewhere in Lebanon to Damascus , '' Perez de Cuellar said.
The Syrians , once the vanguard of Arab radicalism and a longtime Soviet ally
the vanguard of Arab radicalism and a longtime Soviet ally
Israel of blocking the hostage-freeing process.
the initial reports of Anderson 's release.

Staff members uncorked champagne today to toast his freedom. ; The Syrians had said earlier that Anderson would be handed over to U.S. Ambassador Christopher Ross at the Foreign Ministry. ; Anderson 's daughter Sulome , born three months after he was kidnapped , was driven to the U.S. Embassy with her mother Madeleine by American officials .
Sulome , born three months after he was kidnapped
Iran , long the chief backer of Lebanese kidnappers ,
Iran , long the chief backer of Lebanese kidnappers

their 15-year-old daughter Gabrielle , who live in Tokyo , declined comment. ; The hostage saga has been moving toward an end for the United States amid changing political alignments in the Middle East after the Persian Gulf war and the end of the Cold War
